channel.title: How to embed client on web page?
channel.description:
I have made my server and its running fine, but is there a way to embed it onto the webpage (like moparscape have) and let my players play from there. Would i have to do it by using asp? Any help will be appreciated because i really dont have a clue how to do it. If i have posted this in the worng place dont have a go at me, im new to moparscape.
Thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 09:25:17 am[/size][hr]Im going to post this in the Moparscape Client Questions topic i think thats the right place for it
